MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH43 postcode area of Prenton, affecting properties in Croft Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:53AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:07PM on 6th December 2020.
